name: Salomon Aero 7 eSkin Skis + PSP - Unisex
description: Safe and silent, waxless training skis. The Aero 7 use eSkin technology that doesn't need daily waxing, so you spend more time skiing than doing your ski prep. Great for racing or training, they have an easy kick and good agility, without sacrificing glide and quick return.eSkinGrip+ waxless technology uses an integrated strip of skin underfoot so you don't need grip wax.Heel-toe classic camber provides easy kick, good glide and ski return acceleration.Densolite 2000 core is made with a fibreglass wrap and pre-shaped densolite foam core for consistent, responsive flex.S-cut light carving sidecut has a wider platform at the front for control and stability especially when descending outside of tracks.G3 base provides good wax absorption and retention.Prolink Shift Plate accepts any Prolink Shift binding.
